Publications
============

Burgard, C., Notz, D., Pedersen, L. T., and Tonboe, R. T. (2020): "The Arctic Ocean Observation Operator for 6.9 GHz (ARC3O) – Part 1: How to obtain sea-ice brightness temperatures at 6.9 GHz from climate model output", *The Cryosphere*, 14, 2369–2386, https://doi.org/10.5194/tc-14-2369-2020.

Burgard, C., Notz, D., Pedersen, L. T., and Tonboe, R. T. (2020): "The Arctic Ocean Observation Operator for 6.9 GHz (ARC3O) – Part 2: Development and evaluation", *The Cryosphere*, 14, 2387–2407, https://doi.org/10.5194/tc-14-2387-2020.
